Name: registration_id
Comment: ID of the registration that the form score belongs

Name: question_set_id
Comment: ID of the question set that the form score belongs

Name: total_score
Comment: Total score of the application form that the camper earns

Name: finalized
Comment: Boolean value for whether the application is finalized by the Camp Maker

Name: checked
Comment: Boolean value for whether the Camp Maker approved all the documents that are required

Name: passed
Comment: Boolean value for whether the Camper is chosen to join the camp

Name: created_at
Comment: The date at which the form score is created

Name: updated_at
Comment: The date at which the form score is created
